goal.ch:
1. Develop a conceptual understanding of atmospheric thermodynamic processes
2. Understand foundational mathematical and physical principles of atmospheric thermodynamics
3. Understand the atmospheric vertical structures and stability 
4. Apply what you learn in this course to solve problems.
goal.en:
1. Develop a conceptual understanding of atmospheric thermodynamic processes
2. Understand foundational mathematical and physical principles of atmospheric thermodynamics
3. Understand the atmospheric vertical structures and stability 
4. Apply what you learn in this course to solve problems.

outline.ch:
1. Atmospheric composition and structure
2. Thermodynamic systems and variables
3. Gases and equation of state
4. Hydrostatic equation
5. First Law of Thermodynamics
6. Heat Engine: Carnot Cycle
7. Second Law of Thermodynamics
8. Air and water/saturation
9. Thermodynamic charts/vertical profile (Graphical software: GrADS/python）
10. Profiles of atmosphere/Atmospheric Stability
11. Planetary boundary layer (PBL)

2. Thermodynamic systems and variables

textbook.ch:
1. Grant Petty, 2008: A First Course in Atmospheric Thermodynamics. 
2. Wallace, J. M. and P. V. Hobbs, 2006: Atmospheric science: An introductory survey, Chap. 3, 2nd ed., Academic Press, 483 pp.
3. Tsonis, A. A., 2007: An introduction to atmospheric thermodynamics, Cambridge Press, 187 pp.
